metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1315 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in the charset_to_intern function in unix/unix.c in Info-Zip UnZip 6.10b allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted string, as demonstrated by converting a string from CP866 to UTF-8.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1315` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

unzip - 6.0-9ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unzip package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.0-9ubuntu1.3').
